parameters.name: Sheet
parameters.description: Sheet (layout) name of the input file or an empty string for all sheets

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the origin of the imported drawing

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the origin of the imported drawing

title: IImportDxfDwgData.SetPosition
description: Sets the position of the entities created in the drawing.
signature:
System.Boolean SetPosition( 
   System.String
Sheet
,
   System.Int32
Positioning
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
)

parameters.name: Sheet
parameters.description: Sheet (layout) name of the input file or an empty string for all sheets

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the origin of the imported drawing

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the origin of the imported drawing

returns: True if the position is set, false if not
remarks: This method only supports importing to a drawing; it does not support importing to a part sketch.
